userStories.title: View Tax Calendar
acceptanceCriteria: Calendar displays all AEAT models and deadlines for 2026
Multiple view modes available: Month, Week, Day, List/Agenda, Timeline, Year Overview

userStories.title: Filter Tax Models
acceptanceCriteria: Filter by model type (IVA, IRPF, Retenciones, etc.)
Filter by company type (autónomo, PYME, large corporation)
Filter by deadline proximity (next 7 days, 30 days, etc.)
Multiple filters can be applied simultaneously

userStories.title: View Model Details
acceptanceCriteria: Standard view displays: model number, name, deadline, description, who must file
Detailed view toggle available showing: filing instructions, penalties, official AEAT links
Smooth transition between standard and detailed views

userStories.title: Export Calendar
acceptanceCriteria: Downloaded files are properly named with date stamps
CSV includes all relevant model data fields

userStories.title: Manage User Profile
acceptanceCriteria: Set company profile (type: autónomo/PYME/large corp, fiscal obligations)
Add notes per model (personal reminders, filing numbers, etc.)

userStories.title: Set Custom Notifications
acceptanceCriteria: Set multiple reminders per model (e.g., 30, 15, 7, 1 day before)
Configure recurring patterns for monthly/quarterly models
Email notifications sent at configured times
Bulk notification settings for model categories

userStories.title: Subscribe to Calendar
acceptanceCriteria: Generate unique iCal/ICS subscription URL per user
Subscription URL reflects user's favorite models and company profile
Compatible with Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar
Calendar updates automatically when data changes

userStories.title: Track Completion
acceptanceCriteria: Checkbox/toggle to mark model as completed
Completed models visually distinguished in calendar
Filter to show only incomplete obligations
